song.title: O come, o come Emmanuel
song.text:
# O come, o come, Emmanuel, and ransom captive Israel that mourns in lonely exile here until the Son of God appear.
* 1.-3. |: Rejoice! Rejoice! Emmanuel will come to thee, O Israel! :|
# O come, Thou Rod of Jesse, free your own from Satans tyranny. From depths of hell Your people save and give them vict'ry o'er the grave.
# O come, Thou Key of David, come and open wide our heavn'ly home. Make safe the way that leads on high, and close the path to misery.
